resources.string: The most powerful saiyan, reaches an extreme called Ultra instinct
Son of goku, fights vital battles against Cell and majin Bu
The saiyan king, jealous of goku and second most powerful!
Defeated by goku, then his friend, teacher of gohan
God of destruction, food lover, and beaten by goku
The most powerful being in the Universe, but not a God, test by Ultra instinct
Son of Vegeta, time traveller and supreme sword wielder
Fusion of Goku and Vegeta, finishes of Majin Buu
Is stronger even than goku, but is less capable because of low control
